A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ryan Johnson tried his best to ruin Star Wars with his let the past die them.  This movie could have been great if it wasn't almost everything he did.  From Luke throwing away his Father's lightsaber to the 2-hour ship chase\, oh and the Casino scene that leads to nowhere.  Then the worst part killing Luke Skywalker....  I wish Disney would delete this movie from the franchise and remake it.
